trans-unit.source: DVT's personal book library where you can find many programming books , on many different topics.
trans-unit.target: DVT se persoonlike boekebiblioteek waar u baie programmeringsboeke kan vind, op baie verskillende onderwerpe..

trans-unit.id: Words Users Page Admin Describe Books
trans-unit.source: Admin will be able to view all the books in the database , view a specific book , as well as add books and edit already exisiting books in the database.
trans-unit.target: Beheerder kan al die boeke in die databasis besigtig, a spesifieke boek, sowel as boeke by te voeg en reeds bestaande teks te redigeer boeke in die databasis.
trans-unit.note: Words Users Page Admin Describe Books

trans-unit.id: Words Users Page Admin Describe authors
trans-unit.source: Admin will be able to view all the authors in the database , view a specific authors information , as well as add authors and edit already exisiting authors in the database.
trans-unit.target: Beheerder kan al die outeurs in die databasis sien 'n spesifieke outeurinligting, sowel as skrywers by te voeg en te redigeer bestaande outeurs in die databasis.
trans-unit.note: Words Users Page Admin Describe authors

trans-unit.source: Add , Search , Update , and Delete books!
trans-unit.target: Voeg boeke by, soek, werk op en verwyder dit!

trans-unit.source: View book information and search for books!
trans-unit.target: Kyk na boekinligting en soek boeke!
Kies 'n prentjie om op te dateer:

trans-unit.id: Words Edit Book Date Publishe Input
trans-unit.note: Words Edit Book Date Publishe Input
